definitions.body: son of Levi (= [[גרשׁם]] 1Ch 6:1, 1Ch 6:28, 1Ch 15:7 [[גרשׁום]] 1Ch 6:2, 1Ch 6:5, 1Ch 6:47, 1Ch 6:56) Ge 46:11, Ex 6:16, Ex 6:17, Nu 3:17, Nu 3:18, Nu 3:21, Nu 3:25, Nu 4:22, Nu 4:38, Nu 4:41, Nu 7:7, Nu 10:17, Nu 26:57, Jos 21:6, Jos 21:27, 1Ch 5:27, 1Ch 23:6 (particularly in expression sons of Gershon, i.e. family, descendants of Gershon Nu 3:25, Nu 4:22, Nu 4:38, Nu 4:41, Nu 7:7, Nu 10:17, Jos 21:6, Jos 21:27; cf. sons of Gershom 1Ch 6:47, 1Ch 6:56, 1Ch 15:7).
